scripts.predev: powershell -Command "if (Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 5173 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { $p=(Get-CimInstance Win32_Process | Where-Object { $_.CommandLine -match '5173' -or $_.CommandLine -match 'vite' } | Select-Object -First 1).ProcessId; if ($p) { Stop-Process -Id $p -Force } }"
